description: This pathway describes the mechanism of endo- and exocytosis of CFTR channel, based on the article: "New insights into cystic fibrosis: molecular switches that regulate CFTR" by Guggino et al. 2006. On the left side (in red) the endocytic mechanism is shown. Respectively in green on the right sight the exocytic mechanism.  We integrated the functions of PDZ proteins, SNAREs and Rho GTPases.
title: Intracellular trafficking of CFTR
